alert.note: Alert for Barton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 11:34AM CDT until August 29 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Barton County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1215 PM CDT. * At 1133 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Mindenmines, or 11 miles southwest of Lamar, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville... Oakton... Boston... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 57 and 62. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
